migrate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if birds or animals migrate, they travel regularly from one part of the world to another
migrate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if people migrate, they go to live in another area or country, especially in order to find work
migrate.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to start using a different computer system, or to arrange for people to start using a different computer system
migrate.translation[0].definitions[3].de: to move information or software from one computer system to another
migrate.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to go to another area or country, especially in order to find work
migrate.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: In the years ahead, tens of thousands of workers looking for high-paid, technical jobs could migrate abroad.
